body.p:
State of Indian
County of Clark } S.S.

Gustavus V. Erickson Swears. that on the night of the 14th of June 1865 his Dwelling house was broken open. and he the said Erickson was robed. by. of about Twenty Eight Hundred, Dollars, and that he, verily believes that David Rassure, was one of the. Princepal's and that John Rider and Samuel McCarty, are accesory to the, Same, and that said Robery was commited at Blue Lick. in the County of Clark and State of Indiana (Signed) by, Gustavus V. Erickson
Subscribed and Sworn to before me this 9th day of July,, 1865
I Melvin Weir hereby certify the foregoing to be a true copy of Affidavit filed by Gustavus V. Erickson on the 9th day of July 1865

State of Indiana
Clark County } Sct

I Campbell Hay Clerk of the Circuit court, in and for said county, hereby Certify that Melvin Weir, Esquire, whose genuine signature appears to the within certificate, was at the time of time of making said certificate, to wit; on the 9th day of July 1865, a Justice of the Peace, in and for said county of Clark, duly Elected, commissioned & sworn, --
Witnesse my hand & the seal of said court the 10th day of July 1865
